fr.edu.istic.m1.miage.miniediteur.client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.edu.istic.m1.miage.miniediteur.client.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.CaretListener

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, javax.swing.event.CaretListener
    Version:
    2.0 Class Main, this class plays the role of ActionListener of the events of the interface and is the client in one of the command patterns implemented.
    Author:
    Diego Cardenas
